name: Sightline Collapse
description: Consume 1 stored die: Your next Precision attack bypasses cover and forces the target to reroll their defensive set. If the reroll is worse, apply ''Pinned'' for 1 round.
flavor: A Sigma makes the battlefield fold inward around a single bullet.

name: Return Fire Loop
description: When targeted by a ranged attack, you may perform a free Precision set check. On any matched set, reduce the damage and deal 1 point of retaliatory system stress.
flavor: Your reflexes run on predictive code.

name: Momentum Spike
description: If you move at least 2 spaces on your turn, gain +1 pseudo-Width to your next physical action.

name: Persona Echo
description: Project an illusory version of yourself. Once per scene, redirect any effect or check targeting you to the Echo.
flavor: Your timeline has spare versions of you to burn.

name: Scripted Deviation
description: Force a target to take the ''wrong'' action on their next turn. They must use their lowest Width set rolled.
flavor: Reality glitches when you rewrite its stage directions.

name: Overclocked Charm
description: When you succeed on a Charisma roll, gain 1 Momentum. Spend 1 Momentum to shift an NPC''s attitude by one tier upward for a short time.
flavor: A smile, but with firmware support.

name: Viral Spotlight
description: Mark a target. For the next two rounds, any ally attacking the target may reroll one die.

name: Obscura Kernel
description: Your first Stealth roll each encounter generates a ''Ghost Buffer''. Spend it to nullify any trace or signature check.

name: Nullface
description: Once per rest, erase all hostile marks, locks, or tracking identifiers targeting you.

name: Compiler Breakpoint
description: Suspend a digital or semi-digital foe for one round. They cannot act unless they beat your Cyber set.

name: Recompile Pulse
description: Once per scene, re-roll one Cyber die and treat all matching numbers as Width +1.

name: Charm Loop Injection
description: Apply a ''Mesmerized'' condition: target cannot willingly attack you unless provoked.
flavor: Hypnotic code woven through tone and gesture.

name: Crash Guard
description: Once per rest, convert a damaging hit into a freeze. You lose next action but prevent all damage.
flavor: Advanced from the people who brought you forced reboots.

name: Slapdash Bootloader
description: When rolling Wit, you may reroll a die that shows 1. If it re-rolls into a match, gain +1 temporary Width.

name: Vertex Overlink
description: Activate to give all allied Cyber rolls +1 pseudo-Width for 1 round.

name: Vertex Quiet-Core
description: Your Stealth rolls are immune to external penalties for one scene.

name: Woden Firmware Torrent
description: For two rounds, you may treat any single die as matching any set.

name: Woden Stress Cycler
description: Convert all incoming ''system stress'' damage into temporary debuffs instead.
flavor: Pain is data. Data is useful.

name: Mechane Servo-Pulse
description: Empower a melee strike. On hit, shove target 1–2 spaces and impose ''-1 Width'' on their next physical action.
flavor: Made with the same tech that bends steel beams.

name: Mechane Hardjack
description: Force-open any jammed or locked mechanical device with physical torque.

name: Antiqua Arc-Sigil
description: Your next Ingenuity roll also counts as Performance, and vice-versa.
flavor: Old gods repurposed for modern workflows.

name: Antiqua Totem Loop
description: Place a Totem. Allies within 2 spaces gain +1 defense against Spirit-based effects.

name: Civiclink Auto-Compliance
description: Apply ''Hindered'' to a civilian or bureaucratic target with a Charisma check.

name: Scarfix Crypt-Mold
description: Infect a digital target with slow corruption. Each round they take 1 system stress until they pass a Cyber check.
flavor: It spreads like rumor and clings like guilt.

name: Kinetic Snapdart
description: Add a quick flick to an Agility or Precision attack. On hit, apply ''Staggered'' if target''s Agility is lower.
flavor: A tiny trick with outsized payoff.

name: Ghostnote
description: On a successful Performance roll, force the target to misinterpret their next action''s outcome.
flavor: A whisper is all it takes to wreck certainty.

name: Backdoor Mapper
description: Scan any system for structural weak points. Your next Cyber/Engineering roll reveals bypass options.
flavor: Every system keeps a secret; you know where to ask.

name: Adaptive Footwork
description: When rolling Agility, move 1 space before resolving the action. Once per scene ignore forced movement.
flavor: The world adjusts to your pace.

name: Static Lash
description: A basic electrical strike that imposes ''Shorted'', reducing target''s next Cyber or Precision roll.

name: Cryo Spike
description: On hit, freeze footing or circuitry. Target''s movement is halved next round.

name: Biohazard Drip
description: Apply ''Infected''. The target must roll Vitality each round or take escalating penalties.
flavor: Life finds a way—into your bloodstream.

name: Glitchwave
description: Distort a target''s data perceptions. They must reroll one chosen die on their next roll.

name: Sharpset
description: Your next attack using Precision treats its Height result as +1.
flavor: A subtle correction with massive payoff.

name: Overstep
description: When moving, ignore the first tile of hazardous terrain.
flavor: One clean leap solves a hundred problems.

name: Heat Sink
description: Reduce incoming Thermo damage by 1 per hit for the scene.

name: Earthbind Slam
description: Strike the ground, creating tremors. All nearby enemies must reroll their highest die.
flavor: The ground itself becomes your ally.

name: Watercoil
description: Form moisture into conduits. Next elemental attack gains a synergy bonus: add +1 pseudo-Width.

name: Holo Shroud
description: Project a shifting hologram. Treat all attacks against you as if from +1 range band away for 1 round.

name: Voltage Anchor
description: Stabilize a circuit or device. Remove one electronic hazard or disable a trap''s trigger.

name: Pressure Point Overlay
description: Convert a melee hit into a nerve strike. Target loses 1 die from their next roll.
